snippet.title: Teach yourself visually Windows 8 tablets
snippet.description: Teach yourself visually Windows 8 tablets / McFedries, Paul A visual guide to all the features of the new Windows 8 Tablet This must-have resource features visually rich, step-by-step instructions that show you how to get the most enjoyment from your Windows 8 tablet [...] New York, NY : Wiley, 2012. - 338 p.
